values.value:
You may have outstanding timesheet approvals in CATS for the period of approveStart - approveEnd. All timesheets should be approved prior to close of business (COB) Friday of the week that the time relates to, to ensure that timesheets hit the correct fiscal period and/or external agency invoices can be paid.

For team members on the Woolworths network, you can use this link to access CATS or click the "Action" button below to access it via the MyApps portal.

For team members working from home/off site who aren't on the Woolworths network, please click the "Action" button below to access CATS via the MyApps portal.

1. Login to CATS and approve any outstanding timesheets for this period if you haven't already
2. Please mark this task as done as CATS will not automatically update the status on TeamSpace

If you require further information, please refer to this knowledge article.
